text: Day 782 of the Russia-Ukraine war and still no end in sight. 😔 Here are the key events from today:🚨 Russia launches fresh attacks on Ukraine's Donetsk region, killing at least 5 civilians and injuring many more. 💥💢 The US announces it will send an additional $100 million in military aid to Ukraine, bringing the total amount to $1.6 billion since the start of the conflict. 💪🇷🇺 Russia accuses Ukraine of shelling a nuclear power plant, calling it a "terrorist attack." 😱🌎 The UN warns that the ongoing conflict is causing a humanitarian crisis in Ukraine, with over 13,000 civilians killed and 1.5 million displaced. 💔📬 Ukraine's President Zelensky calls for an international tribunal to investigate and prosecute Russian war crimes. 🏢When will the violence end? When will justice be served?
